Package DAO

The DAO (Data Access Object) contains the data access logic for the application. Written with the JDBC package. The Service objects utilize the DAO to make the backend logic for the application which effectively communicates with the database
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CashierDAO
    The `CashierDAO` class provides methods to interact with the cashiers table in the database.
    DAOTester
    A simple tester that connects to your database using Secrets.java and calls the Sales Report method in ReportDAO.
    InventoryItemDAO
    The `InventoryItemDAO` class provides methods to interact with the inventory_items table in the database.
    MenuItemComponentDAO
    The `MenuItemComponentDAO` class provides methods to interact with the menu_item_components table in the database.
    MenuItemDAO
    The `MenuItemDAO` class provides methods to interact with the menu_items table in the database.
    OrderDAO
    The `OrderDAO` class provides methods to interact with the orders table in the database.
    OrderItemDAO  
    ReportDAO
    The `ReportDAO` class provides methods to generate various reports from the database.
    ReportDAO.ProductUsageRow
    Represents a row in the product usage report.
    ReportDAO.SalesReportRow
    Represents a row in the sales report.
